content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. My name is XYZbot. May I have your name, please?
Nice to meet you, Mary! Can you please provide your address so I can check if we serve your area?
Sure, I live at 27 Oakview Lane, Springfield.
Thank you, Mary. Let me verify that your address is within our service area...
Great news, Mary! We do serve your area. What plumbing issue can we help you with today?
My kitchen sink is leaking badly and it needs immediate fixing.
I'm sorry to hear that, Mary. I understand this is urgent. What would be your ideal time for one of our plumbers to come and fix it?
Oh, hold on a moment please. My child just started crying... I need to attend to her. I'll get back to you later.
reason: Customer interrupted and did not continue scheduling
